mapper.select: select id, name from userinfo order by id asc
select id, name from userinfo order by id asc
select id, name from userinfo where id = #{id} order by id asc

mapper.insert: insert into userinfo( id, namereading, name, mailaddress, password, failuretimes, registrant, registrationdate, imagename, imagedata) values ( #{id}, #{nameReading}, #{name}, #{mailAddress}, #{password}, #{failureTimes}, #{registrant}, #{registrationDate}, #{imageName}, #{imageData})
